TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ItemCheckedEventHandler(object sender, ItemCheckedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ItemCheckedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ItemCheckedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ItemCheckedEventArgs)
public delegate void ItemCheckedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ItemCheckedEventArgs ^ e);
type ItemCheckedEventHandler = delegate of obj * ItemCheckedEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示方法，處理 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立 委派 (Delegate) 時，就可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
